articles.author: Cosmin Vasile
articles.title: Oppo's camera-centric flagship is no longer China-exclusive - PhoneArena
articles.description: Oppo Malaysia has just confirmed that the company's Reno10 series smartphones will be available for pre-order in the country starting July 14.
articles.content: Oppos camera-oriented flagships, the Reno10 series, have been available on the market for a few months, but only customers in China can get these. The Reno10, Reno10 Pro, and Reno10 Pro+ are pretty d… [+2310 chars]
